ActTax Court of Canada Act
PrecisOrder directing that COMMISSIONS do issue under the Great Seal of Canada empowering five individuals to administer oaths and to take and receive affidavits, etc., within or outside Canada, in or concerning any proceeding before the TAX COURT OF CANADA.
